mapper.select: select mem.userid, username, address, addressdetail, phone, email, regdate, auth from tbl_member mem LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_member_auth auth on mem.userid = auth.userid
select mem.userid, auth from tbl_member_auth LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_member mem.userid on auth = auth.auth
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(userid, userpw, username, zipCode, address, addressdetail, phone, email, gender, enabled) values (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{zipCode}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{gender}, 1)
mapper.update: update tbl_member set userpw= #{userPw}, zipCode = #{zipCode}, address = #{address}, addressdetail = #{addressDetail}, phone = #{phone}, email= #{email}, updatedate = now() where userid = #{userId}
